about_the_game:
Welcome to Kuru Demo!

Help Kuru go home by scaling up a mountain!
However, Kuru is a bit... of a neat freak, so he can't leave until he cleans up everything along the way! Help reorganize mats and bookshelves in a teahouse, fish and koi in a pond and much much more! Bring Kuru back to his family in this relaxing puzzle game.

Note: this demo has 21 levels for you to enjoy! The full release will have over 125!

Features

  • 3 out of 5 Regions
    Each region comes with their own mechanics! Whether it is lighting up the area so Kuru can cross or making sure certain blocks are next to each other so they don't get lonely, each area is crafted to tickle your brain
  • Hand Drawn Art
    Explore each region and enjoy our hand drawn areas meant to help you relax! Each animation was done with love and is for all to enjoy!
  • Relaxing Custom Music
    KURU has custom made Lo-fi music meant to blur the lines between the modern and traditional styles of the game. Relax, turn down the lights, and just enjoy playing.

Credits

All assets and music are made inhouse by SolBreak Studios LLC.

This makes us sound fancy, but we have no idea what we are doing.
